examples.patterns.decorator

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • examples.patterns.decorator.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Equipment, Player

    abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class is the root object of the Decorator Pattern's hierarchy. It is this class Type that the decorations will take as a parameter in their constructors. It is also this class that the base object (Player), and the base decoration (Equipment) will inherit from.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      double attack 
      double defence

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Entity() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract double getAttack()
      Returns the current attack of the entity, which is the attack value after all layers have done their calculations
      abstract double getDefence()
      Returns the current defence of the entity, which is the defence value after all layers have done their calculations
      void setAttack(double attack)
      Sets the attack value of this layer.
      void setDefence(double defence)
      Sets the defence value of this layer

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
